entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
